hymn.title: Lord, You revealed Yourself to me

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You re -- vealed Your -- self to me, You showed me Your pur -- pose, To have the church as Your bod -- y So You can min -- gle all that You are. Though I am blind -- ed by self and flesh But You, dear Lord, have cho -- sen me As a ves -- sel to con -- tain You And ex -- press You 'til You come back.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, You revealed Yourself to me, You showed me Your purpose, To have the church as Your body So You can mingle all that You are.
Though I am blinded by self and flesh But You, dear Lord, have chosen me As a vessel to contain You And express You 'til You come back.
Forgive me, Lord I'm open to You. Fill me more and more each day. Build me with the saints in love And keep us running toward the prize.
Lord keep me growing and functioning. Don't ever let me out of Your sight. Grant me a spirit of boldness. Open my mouth, Lord, to prophesy.
